The quoted temperature rise from the commencement of industrialisation until the present was excessive. Thermometer data which poorly covers Africa, Antarctica and the Oceans suggests a rise of 0.8 degrees centigrade.
The climate models assume that carbon dioxide acts anomalously to significantly heat the remaining 2499/2500 of earth’s atmosphere. Nevertheless, the world will be a vastly different place in 79 years time with significant technological changes. This doomsday prediction about the climate is almost certainly wrong.
It would be interesting to check back in 20 years to see how the model is comparing with reality.
